column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The Tonkotsu Black had a richer broth and a thinner noodle
column2: so it was even better. We basically bullied my friend into making his meal a combo so we could try the pork chasu bowl. This is how we abuse our seniority. He got a ramen
column5: it's way too much food for one person. Our server advised us that the pork chasu was better than the chicken
column6: which he finds bland. It reminded me of my mom's cooking
column7: but needed more meat and sauce to pair with the large portion of rice.
